A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I saw this movie 3 times in theaters. When I came out of it the first time\, I wasnt sure I liked it. I had mixed feelings about how things happened. Over the next few days I thought more and more about it. The more I thought\, the more upset I became. I went and saw the movie a second time that next weekend and left feeling better about the movie\, but only because I had come to accept what it was. I hold Episode V as one of my all time favorite movies and I have to say that if things continue this way with the current star wars universe that I will have lost any good will I hold towards this once epic franchise.
